head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEVITZ, BERNARD S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEVITZ, BERNARD S.

block.p: LEVITZ-Bernard S. Age 88, of Monroe Township, NJ, and Pembroke Pines, FL, on August 25, 2000. Husband of Florence. Father of Temmie Covar and Lee Epstein. Stepfather of Scott, Ricky and Joel Goldstein. Brother of Mortimer and Nathan. Grandfather of eleven; great-grandfather of two. Services were held Sunday at Mount Sinai Memorial Chapels, East Brunswick, NJ.
